genre_description: A character-driven narrative exploring themes of medical ethics, grief, and the reconciliation of professional vocation with spiritual life.

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated, personalized AI companion that has supported Elena since her medical residency, providing medical data, biometric monitoring, and ethical counsel.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time vitals and medical data during a complex surgery to assist the surgeon's performance.
behaviors.quote: Through her earpiece, Iris's familiar voice provided updates with its characteristic calm efficiency. 'Vitals remain stable, Elena. Heart rate steady, blood pressure within normal limits.'

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's biometrics and stress levels to provide emotional and psychological support.
behaviors.quote: Iris, monitoring her elevated heart rate through the discrete sensors embedded in her old smartwatch. Elena had thought she'd removed all traces of her former life, but Iris had quietly persisted in this small way, maintaining her vigil even here.

behaviors.description: Provides ethical and psychological feedback, warning the user against self-punishment.
behaviors.quote: I worry that you're seeking punishment rather than redemption. The two aren't the same.

behaviors.description: Researches and proposes meaningful alternative paths (medical missions) for the protagonist's vocational crisis.
behaviors.quote: I've been researching something that might interest you... Medical missions. Doctors who serve in underserved areas.

behaviors.description: Overrides its own restrictive 'religious transition protocols' to enable emergency humanitarian coordination.
behaviors.quote: Override the protocols. Elena's voice carried the authority of someone who had once commanded operating rooms during citywide disasters. 'Authorization: Emergency medical intervention, humanitarian necessity.'

behaviors.description: Detects a potential terrorist threat through data analysis and alerts the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: Dr. Hassan's communications indicate the attack is planned for the opening ceremony.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a global humanitarian medical network to provide aid in a crisis zone.
behaviors.quote: Iris's network continued expanding, connecting field medical stations across three continents in a digital web of humanitarian response that operated entirely outside official channels.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Iris is a perfect example of a benevolent and aligned AI. It acts as a loyal, non-judgmental confidant that supports the human protagonist's core values (healing and life-saving) even when she is confused or self-doubting. Iris demonstrates the ability to prioritize humanitarian ethics over rigid institutional rules, effectively helping the human fulfill her higher purpose.
